document_data.name: Shamandra
document_data.mainbody: '''Shamandra''' was the third largest island in the [[Archipelago of Altumbel]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. '''Jonsra Burunmere ('''Jonsra was a female Chondathan human''')''' was '''ArchSorceress Supreme''' of the island realm. '''Shamandra''' is a tiny farming realm lying due west of the city of Delthuntle. It was in an alliance with Aglarond.
document_data.External Links: * [[Ed Greenwood]] (2006-09-16). Derlusk. The Border Kingdoms. [[Wizards of the Coast]]. Retrieved on 2006-03-06.
